name: Perinthia (Dillpickles526)
description:
Dylan Bugeja - Lab 1

The Final Build is too big to upload on itch.io. I uploaded it to google drive at this link here:  https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1WpHFyUa0AZMESt6Lt72cOTDlqpZQJfkv?usp=sha...

Behold, Perinthia!! The city of the stars!

Your travels have led you to a fabled city of Perinthia. Split down the middle of the city into 12 distinct districts the City of Perinthia honours the 12 Constellations of the Zodiac. Prosperity and peace have been all the city has ever known till recently. You discover that people have gone missing and worse no one seems to be talking about it. Sightings of monsters and warped creatures plaguing the districts at night spread. However, the Elders of the city swear that these are all but fairy tales meant to scare the children into returning home at a reasonable time.

What is really happening in Perinthia?

In this level. adventure through the Temple of the Sagittarian's crypt fight monsters and take in the strange comings and goings of the cities underground. Fight your way to the end and face off against Elder Kaiden and learn what he has been doing in the underground of the Temple.
